title: Who said it? Trump, Elon, or Ye

questions.quote: I know more about manufacturing than anyone currently alive on earth.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk
questions.context: Interview with Chris Anderson at TED, 2022

questions.quote: We have the resources as a civilization to find a utopia, but we're led by the most greedy and the least noble.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: Nobody knows more about technology than me.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: If I die under mysterious circumstances, it's been nice knowin ya.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I feel like I'm too busy writing history to read it.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: The woke mind virus is either defeated or nothing else matters.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I alone can fix it.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: There's a billion-to-one chance we're living in base reality.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I am the chosen one.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I am a god. I just told you who I thought I was. A god.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I am an alien.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: All I know about magnets is this, give me a glass of water, let me drop it on the magnets, that's the end of the magnets.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: For me to say I wasn't a genius, I would just be lying to you and to myself.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: Pronouns suck.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I'm a bit sleepy tonight but when I wake up I'm going death con 3 On JEWISH PEOPLE.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: My mind is a storm... I don't think most people would want to be me.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I'm a very smart person. I don't have to be told the same thing in the same words every single day.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Society has put up so many boundaries... that it's almost impossible to get a pure thought out.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I think apologizing's a great thing, but you have to be wrong.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I play to people's fantasies... That's why a little hyperbole never hurts.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I am the new Moses.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I'm doing pretty good as far as geniuses go.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: You know what uranium is, right? It's this thing called nuclear weapons. And other things.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I think it is possible for ordinary people to choose to be extraordinary.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: My ego is my trick to keep me sane.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: Nobody has better respect for intelligence than I do.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Some people don't like change, but you need to embrace change if the alternative is disaster.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I actually can't be Anti Semitic because black people are actually Jew also.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: My fingers are long and beautiful, as, it has been well documented, are various other parts of my body.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I have a gut, and my gut tells me more sometimes than anybody else's brain can ever tell me.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Who controls the memes, controls the Universe.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: Part of the beauty of me is that I am very rich.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I realize that my place and position in history is that I will go down as the voice of this generation.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: Sometimes people write novels and they just be so wordy and so self-absorbed.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I'm nauseatingly pro-human.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I think the only difference between me and the other candidates is that I'm more honest and my women are more beautiful.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: My mentality is that of a samurai. I would rather commit seppuku than fail.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I try to learn from the past, but I plan for the future by focusing exclusively on the present.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: You can't look at a glass half full or empty if it's overflowing.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: If you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. Otherwise, it's not.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I don't hire a lot of number-crunchers, and I don't trust fancy marketing surveys.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I'm not comfortable with comfort.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I am a free speech absolutist.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: Show me someone without an ego, and I'll show you a loser.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I operate on the physics approach to analysis.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I'm going to be one of the biggest real estate developers of all time.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I don't spend my time pontificating about high-concept things; I spend my time solving engineering and manufacturing problems.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: Just stop lying about shit. Just stop lying.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I like thinking big. If you're going to be thinking anything, you might as well think big.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: If you need inspiring words, don't do it.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I am the glitch.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I keep forgetting that you're still alive.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: Anyone who thinks my story is anywhere near over is sadly mistaken.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: People always say you can't please everybody. I think that's a cop-out. Why not attempt it?
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: To our knowledge, we are the only life that exists.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I think I am actually humble. I think I'm much more humble than you would understand.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I'm ten years ahead of your mentality.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: It's always good to be underestimated.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: I am the least racist person you have ever interviewed.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I leave my emojis bart simpson color.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: I could either watch it happen or be a part of it.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: My biggest mistake is probably weighing too much on someone's talent and not someone's personality.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: Every time somebody said I made a mistake, they do the polls and my numbers go up.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I think most people can learn a lot more than they think they can.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: God is using me to show off.
questions.speaker: Ye

questions.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
questions.speaker: Elon Musk

questions.quote: My Twitter has become so powerful that I can actually make my enemies tell the truth.
questions.speaker: Donald Trump

questions.quote: I will be the leader of a company that ends up being worth billions of dollars, because I got the answers.
questions.speaker: Ye
